Russian troops are used against Ukrainian defenders gaseous substances. The use of weapons of this type is a violation of the laws of war.

About thisreportedOperational Command "North".

The other day, the enemy discharged gas grenade into the armor of the fighters of the Rifle Battalion.

However, the soldier on the pseudo "Yari" reacted instantly and threw a grenade outside.

“I have an impression that they try to take us from hopelessness. But nothing will work in them, ”Yari said.

The K-51 gas grenade was used against the Ukrainian military. This pomegranate was designed in the late 1970s, has a solid plastic housing with a metal bottom. The sealed housing of the grenade is filled with a powdered substance of the non -lethal substance.

BeforeIt was reportedAbout the increase in the use of the Russian occupation army of ammunition with poisonous substances in the Zaporozhye direction.

As of the end of February, Russia since the beginning of a large -scale warmadeIn Ukraine, 1068 chemical attacks.
